text: Norberto Constante Boggio (11 August 1931 - 20 December 2021) was an Argentine football forward. He was born in Santa Fe, Argentina. He played for Argentina in the 1958 FIFA World Cup. He also played for San Lorenzo de Almagro. Boggio died on 20 December 2021 in Santa Fe, Argentina at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Argentine footballers
title: Norberto Boggio
